ticket.title: Backup/restore tooling (minimal set): export/import FAC control-plane state (receipts, policy, horizons) without bulky caches

in_scope: - exports: receipts, receipt index, admitted policy/economics digests, broker horizons/refs
- excludes: target dirs, cargo caches, sccache by default
- imports into a fresh node with bounded validation

steps: Implement export/import with signature verification for receipts if enabled.

criteria: A node can be rebuilt with minimal authoritative state and warmed after restore, matching the RFC restore story.
